titleStmt.title: A word in season. Most humbly offered to the consideration of the honorable House of Commons. Being a prospect of publick grievances, with some particulars relating to the imbezling of prizes and prize goods; together with the proceedings of the Commissioners for Prizes.
titleStmt.author: Everett, George, Shipwright.
